text: “Ambuye, Inu ndithudi, mwandipatsa ine ulemerero ndi kundiphunzitsa kutanthauzira maloto. Inu ndinu Namalenga wakumwamba ndi dziko lapansi. Inu ndinu Msungi wanga m’dziko lino ndiponso m’dziko limene lili nkudza. Ndilekeni kuti ndife ndili kukulambirani inu ndipo ndiikeni m’gulu la anthu abwino.”
